Translations.Text: O vi kred ne befriend those recipients previous scripture mok ridicule your religi nor shall vi befriend disbelievers! Vi reverence DI vi est really believers
When vi vok al Kontakt Prayers (Salat) ili mok ridicule gxi. This est ili est popol who ne kompren
dir O popol scripture vi ne hate us ni kred en DI en ki revealed us en ki revealed antaux us, kaj plej de vi ne est righteous
Dir Let me tell vi est mav sight DI those kondamn DI incurring His wrath gxis Li far them as despicable as simi pork idol worshipers! These est far mav farther dekstr path
When ili ven vi ili dir Ni kred eben ili est plen da disbelief when ili entered ili est plen de disbelief when ili las. DI EST fully aware da CXIO ILI conceal
Vi seg many da them readily committing evil transgression mangx el illicit earnings Miserable ja est ki ili do
Se nur raben priests enjoin them their sinful utterances illicit earnings Miserable ja est ki ili commit

Jud eben dir di man lig Gxi est their man lig down Ili kondamn por uttering such blasphemy! Instead His man est largx open spending as Li vol. Por cert, your Lord's revelations al vi kauxz many da them plongx profund into transgression disbelief! Consequently ni committed them animosity hatred themselves Tag Resurrection. Whenever ili ignite flam milit DI puts them! Ili roam ter wickedly DI dislikes evildoers
Nur popol scripture kred plumb righteous life ni tiam remit their pek admit them into gxarden bliss
Nur ili uphold Torah Gospel ki send down them herein their Lord ili est dusx kun blessings el super them beneath their fut! Kelk da them est righteous many da them est evildoers
